plot outline: Just before his arrest, Shyam manages to hide a diamond at a nearby construction site, intending to retrieve it as soon as he gets out of prison. When he's released two years later, he's horrified to discover that the building site is now police headquarters, with his stolen gem forming part of the foundation. Shyam decides to create and play the role of Inspector Ram and soon becomes the favourite of ACP Ranbir Singh (Paresh Rawal) at the police station. But life is not that easy for the impostor, who quickly comes to the attention of the ever-suspicious Inspector Pande (Om Puri). Amidst all this mayhem Ram actually finds time to romance Inspector Ranjita (Bipasha Basu). But he also plays the character of Shyam with Ranbir's daughter Komal (Shilpa Shetty). Soon they become lovers. Whilst Ram/Shyam is busy with his hectic love life, other criminals, Tito (Ashish Vidhyarthi) and Tony (Rajat Bedi), are searching for the diamond.
title: Chor Machaaye Shor
plot: A thief pretends to be a cop in order to recover his diamond from a site that has been converted into the police headquarters. Although he becomes a favourite of the ACP, a colleague gets suspicious.

Petty thief Shyam and his associates successfully steal a priceless diamond; with the police hot on his trail Shyam manages to conceal it in an under-construction building before he's arrested, convicted, and sentenced to two years in prison. After his release, he's horrified to see that the building now houses police headquarters. He decides to pose as Inspector Ram and get employed at police headquarters, with the motive of retrieving the diamond. But DCP Pandey is suspicious of him, ACP Ranvir Singh wants him to marry his daughter Kaajal, and his associates just can't let him keep that diamond to himself.::gavin (racktoo@hotmail.com)

Career thief Shyam and three of his associates manage to steal a valuable diamond and despite being chased by the police, they manage to conceal it before Shyam is arrested, tried in Court, and sentenced to two years in prison. Upon his discharge, he and his associates return to retrieve the diamond, and are horrified to find that the venue is now the new Police Headquarters. Shyam manages to change his name to Ram, gets hired as a Police Inspector, and locates the diamond. But trouble's on the horizon:ACP Ranvir Singh wants him to wed his daughter Kaajal; DCP Pandey suspects him; and his associates are ready to betray him and keep the diamond for themselves.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
